document.title: Hot Topic: Revised: Attention All Cities with Fewer than 50 Employees with Commercial Drivers' Licenses, Drug Testing Deadline Looms for Employees with Commercial Drivers' Licenses
document.abstract: Discusses the Jan. 1, 1996 federal deadline for instituting drug and alcohol testing for cities with fewer than 50 employees who are required to have commercial drivers' licenses (CDLs).
